sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "TOTALCOUNT" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM1) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM1_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM1) AS "DDERRNOITM1_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM2) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM2_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM2) AS "DDERRNOITM2_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM3) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM3_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM3) AS "DDERRNOITM3_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM4) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM4_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM4) AS "DDERRNOITM4_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM5) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM5_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM5) AS "DDERRNOITM5_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM6) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM6_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM6) AS "DDERRNOITM6_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM7) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM7_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM7) AS "DDERRNOITM7_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM8) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM8_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM8) AS "DDERRNOITM8_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM9) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM9_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM9) AS "DDERRNOITM9_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM10) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM10_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM10) AS "DDERRNOITM10_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM11) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM11_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM11) AS "DDERRNOITM11_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM12) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM12_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM12) AS "DDERRNOITM12_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM13) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM13_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM13) AS "DDERRNOITM13_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM14) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM14_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM14) AS "DDERRNOITM14_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM15) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM15_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM15) AS "DDERRNOITM15_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM16) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM16_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM16) AS "DDERRNOITM16_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM17) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM17_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM17) AS "DDERRNOITM17_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM18) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM18_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM18) AS "DDERRNOITM18_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM19) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM19_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM19) AS "DDERRNOITM19_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM20) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM20_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM20) AS "DDERRNOITM20_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM21) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM21_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM21) AS "DDERRNOITM21_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM22) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM22_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM22) AS "DDERRNOITM22_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM23) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM23_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM23) AS "DDERRNOITM23_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM24) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM24_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM24) AS "DDERRNOITM24_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM25) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM25_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM25) AS "DDERRNOITM25_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM26) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM26_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM26) AS "DDERRNOITM26_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM27) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM27_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM27) AS "DDERRNOITM27_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM28) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM28_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM28) AS "DDERRNOITM28_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM29) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM29_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM29) AS "DDERRNOITM29_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM30) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM30_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM30) AS "DDERRNOITM30_SUM" , SUM(DDTRSMTNOITM31) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM31_SUM" , SUM(DDERRNOITM31) AS "DDERRNOITM31_SUM" FROM ( SELECT ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD, SUM(ST03.S1DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM1, SUM(ST03.S1DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM1, SUM(ST03.S1DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL1, SUM(ST03.S2DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM2, SUM(ST03.S2DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM2, SUM(ST03.S2DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL2, SUM(ST03.S3DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM3, SUM(ST03.S3DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM3, SUM(ST03.S3DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL3, SUM(ST03.S4DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM4, SUM(ST03.S4DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM4, SUM(ST03.S4DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL4, SUM(ST03.S5DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM5, SUM(ST03.S5DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM5, SUM(ST03.S5DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL5, SUM(ST03.S6DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM6, SUM(ST03.S6DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM6, SUM(ST03.S6DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL6, SUM(ST03.S7DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM7, SUM(ST03.S7DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM7, SUM(ST03.S7DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL7, SUM(ST03.S8DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM8, SUM(ST03.S8DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM8, SUM(ST03.S8DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL8, SUM(ST03.S9DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM9, SUM(ST03.S9DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM9, SUM(ST03.S9DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL9, SUM(ST03.S10DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM10, SUM(ST03.S10DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM10, SUM(ST03.S10DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL10, SUM(ST03.S11DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM11, SUM(ST03.S11DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM11, SUM(ST03.S11DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL11, SUM(ST03.S12DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM12, SUM(ST03.S12DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM12, SUM(ST03.S12DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL12, SUM(ST03.S13DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM13, SUM(ST03.S13DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM13, SUM(ST03.S13DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL13, SUM(ST03.S14DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM14, SUM(ST03.S14DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM14, SUM(ST03.S14DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL14, SUM(ST03.S15DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM15, SUM(ST03.S15DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM15, SUM(ST03.S15DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL15, SUM(ST03.S16DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM16, SUM(ST03.S16DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM16, SUM(ST03.S16DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL16, SUM(ST03.S17DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM17, SUM(ST03.S17DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM17, SUM(ST03.S17DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL17, SUM(ST03.S18DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM18, SUM(ST03.S18DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM18, SUM(ST03.S18DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL18, SUM(ST03.S19DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM19, SUM(ST03.S19DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM19, SUM(ST03.S19DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL19, SUM(ST03.S20DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM20, SUM(ST03.S20DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM20, SUM(ST03.S20DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL20, SUM(ST03.S21DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM21, SUM(ST03.S21DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM21, SUM(ST03.S21DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL21, SUM(ST03.S22DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM22, SUM(ST03.S22DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM22, SUM(ST03.S22DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL22, SUM(ST03.S23DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM23, SUM(ST03.S23DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM23, SUM(ST03.S23DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL23, SUM(ST03.S24DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM24, SUM(ST03.S24DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM24, SUM(ST03.S24DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL24, SUM(ST03.S25DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM25, SUM(ST03.S25DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM25, SUM(ST03.S25DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL25, SUM(ST03.S26DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM26, SUM(ST03.S26DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM26, SUM(ST03.S26DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL26, SUM(ST03.S27DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM27, SUM(ST03.S27DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM27, SUM(ST03.S27DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL27, SUM(ST03.S28DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM28, SUM(ST03.S28DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM28, SUM(ST03.S28DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL28, SUM(ST03.S29DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM29, SUM(ST03.S29DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM29, SUM(ST03.S29DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL29, SUM(ST03.S30DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM30, SUM(ST03.S30DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM30, SUM(ST03.S30DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL30, SUM(ST03.S31DDTRSMTNOITM) AS DDTRSMTNOITM31, SUM(ST03.S31DDERRNOITM) AS DDERRNOITM31, SUM(ST03.S31DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS DDRSPNSAVGVAL31 FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST03 ST03 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 CM01 ON TRIM(ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD) = CM01.EAIBZWKDSTCD WHERE ST03.STATCYM BETWEEN #searchStart# AND #searchEnd#
( TRIM(ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE CONCAT( '%',CONCAT( UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#) , '%') ) OR CM01.BZWKDSTICNAME LIKE CONCAT( '%',CONCAT( UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#) , '%') ) )
GROUP BY ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD ) A

SELECT ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD", SUM(ST03.S1DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM1", SUM(ST03.S1DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM1", SUM(ST03.S1DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL1", SUM(ST03.S2DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM2", SUM(ST03.S2DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM2", SUM(ST03.S2DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL2", SUM(ST03.S3DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM3", SUM(ST03.S3DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM3", SUM(ST03.S3DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL3", SUM(ST03.S4DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM4", SUM(ST03.S4DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM4", SUM(ST03.S4DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL4", SUM(ST03.S5DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM5", SUM(ST03.S5DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM5", SUM(ST03.S5DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL5", SUM(ST03.S6DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM6", SUM(ST03.S6DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM6", SUM(ST03.S6DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL6", SUM(ST03.S7DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM7", SUM(ST03.S7DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM7", SUM(ST03.S7DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL7", SUM(ST03.S8DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM8", SUM(ST03.S8DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM8", SUM(ST03.S8DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL8", SUM(ST03.S9DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM9", SUM(ST03.S9DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM9", SUM(ST03.S9DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL9", SUM(ST03.S10DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM10", SUM(ST03.S10DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM10", SUM(ST03.S10DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL10", SUM(ST03.S11DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM11", SUM(ST03.S11DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM11", SUM(ST03.S11DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL11", SUM(ST03.S12DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM12", SUM(ST03.S12DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM12", SUM(ST03.S12DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL12", SUM(ST03.S13DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM13", SUM(ST03.S13DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM13", SUM(ST03.S13DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL13", SUM(ST03.S14DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM14", SUM(ST03.S14DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM14", SUM(ST03.S14DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL14", SUM(ST03.S16DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM16", SUM(ST03.S16DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL16", SUM(ST03.S17DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM17", SUM(ST03.S17DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM17", SUM(ST03.S17DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL17", SUM(ST03.S18DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM18", SUM(ST03.S18DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM18", SUM(ST03.S18DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL18", SUM(ST03.S19DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM19", SUM(ST03.S19DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM19", SUM(ST03.S19DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL19", SUM(ST03.S20DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM20", SUM(ST03.S20DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM20", SUM(ST03.S20DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL20", SUM(ST03.S21DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM21", SUM(ST03.S21DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM21", SUM(ST03.S21DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL21", SUM(ST03.S22DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM22", SUM(ST03.S22DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM22", SUM(ST03.S22DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL22", SUM(ST03.S23DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM23", SUM(ST03.S23DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM23", SUM(ST03.S23DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL23", SUM(ST03.S24DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM24", SUM(ST03.S24DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM24", SUM(ST03.S24DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL24", SUM(ST03.S25DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM25", SUM(ST03.S25DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM25", SUM(ST03.S25DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL25", SUM(ST03.S26DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM26", SUM(ST03.S26DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM26", SUM(ST03.S26DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL26", SUM(ST03.S27DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM27", SUM(ST03.S27DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM27", SUM(ST03.S27DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL27", SUM(ST03.S28DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM28", SUM(ST03.S28DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM28", SUM(ST03.S28DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL28", SUM(ST03.S29DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM29", SUM(ST03.S29DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM29", SUM(ST03.S31DDTRSMTNOITM) AS "DDTRSMTNOITM31", SUM(ST03.S31DDERRNOITM) AS "DDERRNOITM31", SUM(ST03.S31DDRSPNSAVGVAL) AS "DDRSPNSAVGVAL31" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIST03 ST03 LEFT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 CM01 ON TRIM(ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD) = CM01.EAIBZWKDSTCD WHERE STATCYM BETWEEN #searchStart# AND #searchEnd#
( TRIM(ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD) LIKE CONCAT( '%',CONCAT( UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#) , '%') ) OR CM01.BZWKDSTICNAME LIKE CONCAT( '%',CONCAT( UPPER(#searchEaiBzwkDstcd#) , '%') ) )
GROUP BY ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD ORDER BY ST03.EAIBZWKDSTCD
